oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kitāb al-Fawāʼid al-jalīlah fī musalsalāt al-ʻAllāmah al-Shaykh Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-maʻrūf bi-ʻAqīlah : manuscript, 1904
Fawāʼid al-jalīlah fī musalsalāt Ibn ʻAqīlah
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ʻAqīlah, Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad , -1737 or 1738
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in several hands, in one column, from 15 to 21 lines per page, in black rubricated in red, sometimes framed within double red lines.
According to colophon (f. 40r), copy completed on 12 Muḥarram 1322 AH [March 30, 1904 AD] in the hand of Aḥmad Fahmī ibn Salīm al-ʻAṭṭār, most probably in Damascus.

With this is bound: Kitāb al-ʻIqd al-jawhar al-thamīn fī arbaʻīn ḥadīthan min aḥādīth Sayyid al-Mursalīn / Ismāʻīl al-ʻAjlūnī al-Jarrāḥī (ff. 41r-62r) ; Thabat al-Shihāb Aḥmad al-ʻAṭṭār (ff. 63r-81v) ; Risālah fī ʻilm muṣṭalaḥ al-ḥadīth al-sharīf / Muḥammad ʻAṭāʼ Allāh al-Kasm (ff. 83r-105v) ; Risālat Ṣiḥāḥ al-nuqūl fī radd al-fatwá bi-ṭahārat al-kuḥūl / Muḥammad ʻAṭāʼ al-Kasm (ff. 108r-120r) ; Kitāb al-Ḥikam / Muḥyī al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn al-ʻArabī (ff. 121r-128v) ; Kitāb al-Barāhīn al-jalīyah fī ʻilm al-kalām / Muḥammad Rashīd ibn Sinān (ff. 129r-144v).
MS Arab 112. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hadith
Hadith--Authorities
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: فوائد الجليلة في مسلسلات ابن عقيلة
كتاب الفوائد الجليلة في مسلسلات العلامة الشيخ محمد بن احمد المعروف بابن عقيلة : مخطوطة، 1904
